Invocation for leaving the mosque.ARABIC_TEXT: ((يَبْدَأُ بِرِجْلِهِ الْيُسْرَى))  وَيَقُولُ: ((بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَالصّلَاةُ وَالسَّلَامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِك، اللَّهُمَّ اعْصِمْنِي مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ)).
Invocation for leaving the mosque.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Bismil-lah wassalatu wassalamu AAala rasoolil-lah, allahumma innee as-aluka min fadlik, allahumma iAAsimnee minash-shaytanir-rajeem.)
Invocation for leaving the mosque.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah.  O Allah, I ask You from Your favour.  O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.)
